db--table--sql: -- -- 
select 'database' type,count(*) cnt from information_schema.SCHEMATA  
     union all
     select 'table' type,count(*) cnt from information_schema.TABLES a
            where table_type='BASE TABLE' 
     union all
     select 'events' type,count(*) cnt from information_schema.EVENTS b
            
     union all
     select 'triggers' type,count(*) cnt
            from information_schema.TRIGGERS c 
     union all
     select 'procedure' type,count(*) cnt from information_schema.ROUTINES d
            where routine_type='PROCEDURE' 
     union all
     select 'function' type,count(*) cnt from information_schema.ROUTINES e
            where routine_type='FUNCTION' 
     union all
     select 'views' type,count(*) cnt
            from information_schema.views f 
     union all
     select 'index' type,count(distinct index_name) cnt
            from information_schema.STATISTICS g 
     union all
     select 'partition table' type,count(*) cnt from information_schema.PARTITIONS p
            where partition_name is not null 
     union all 
     select  'total_row_count' type, SUM(table_rows) as cnt
     from information_schema.TABLES
     where table_type='BASE TABLE'
     union all 
     select 'total_table_space' type,concat(round(sum((data_length + index_length)/1024/1024),2),'MB') as cnt from
     information_schema.TABLES
